name: Combat Cloud Car
Lore: 'Enclosed Ubrikkian Talon I Combat Cloud Car. Speeds up to 1,875 kph. Exceptional maneuverability makes this a favorite of outer Rim security forces.',
Text: 'Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. At cloud sectors, power and maneuver +1, may deploy as a ''react'' and may move and be targeted by weapons like a starfighter.',
